high_descs: Turn around and walk to the bed.
Pick up the "What is math?" book on the bed.
Walk around the left side of the bed and veer left to the desk.
Turn on the lamp on the desk.
anns.task_desc: Look at a book by the light of a lamp.

high_descs: Turn around and go to the foot of the bed.
Pick up the book from the bed.
Turn left and go to the desk in the far corner of the room.
anns.task_desc: Use the light from the lamp to look at the book.

high_descs: Turn and walk to the bed
Grab the book that is on the bed
carry the book over to  the night stand
Hold the book in front of the night stand
anns.task_desc: Take the math book to the night stand
